name: Divine Summit
description: Divine Summit is a game I am currently working on that combines MOBA gameplay with Machine Learning AI. I am working on the game development of the game and leading that team. This includes the level design, character/ability design,  and general gameplay design. This project has received funding from 2 different programs, under the RIT MAGIC maker program, in which I have participated. I continue to develop this project with the entire team through those programs and outside of them.
